summary:
The Security Council,
Noting with regret Judge Gilbert Guillaume's resignation effective 11 February 2005,
Noting a vacancy in the International Court of Justice will occur for the remainder of his term,
Decides the election to fill the vacancy will take place on 15 February 2005. 
 The election will occur at a meeting of the Security Council and a meeting of the General Assembly at its fifty-ninth session, 
The date of the election was fixed as per article 14 of the Statute of the Court.
